description_html:
Splitty boasts a unique joint design that makes it one of the most flexible lights in the Koncept collection. Koncept designers perfected a diffused light source with hidden LEDs, allowing the lamp to perform as a radiant ambient light as well as a functional task light. A USB output port is discreetly positioned, presenting convenient phone or tablet charging options. Splitty Pro features an occupancy sensor to maximize energy efficiency.

Splitty's thoughtful, minimalist design coupled with heightened functionality make for a piece highly desired by consumers and designers alike.
